articles.description: Get latest scores, follow live text updates and listen to radio commentary on final day of the Solheim Cup at Robert Trent Jones Golf Club in Gainesville, Virginia.

articles.description: Lando Norris drives an extraordinary race to catch as his McLaren team-mate Oscar Piastri wins an engrossing Azerbaijan Grand Prix.
articles.title: Azerbaijan GP: Oscar Piastri wins as Lando Norris gains on Max Verstappen

articles.description: Lamine Yamal scores twice as Barcelona ruthlessly maintain their perfect start to the season with a 4-1 win over Girona at Estadi Montilivi.
articles.title: Girona 1-4 Barcelona: Lamine Yamil, Dani Olmo and Pedri score in Barca victory

articles.description: England and Australia's T20 series ends in a draw after the third T20 at Old Trafford is washed out.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Third T20 washed out without a ball bowled

articles.description: Great Britain miss out on the Davis Cup knockout stages after Dan Evans fell to a heavy defeat by Canada's Denis Shapovalov.
articles.title: Davis Cup 2024: Great Britain's Finals hopes over after Dan Evans loses to Canada's Denis Shapovalov

articles.description: Ireland beat England for the first time in women's T20 internationals, completing their record chase in Dublin to draw the series 1-1.
articles.title: Ireland vs England: Hosts seal famous win in Dublin to draw T20 series 1-1

articles.description: Arsenal's attention to detail at set-pieces exposes Tottenham's greatest weakness yet again, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Tottenham 0-1 Arsenal: Gabriel & Gunners expose Spurs' set-piece flaws
